main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena in Suva, Fiji Islands on April 3, 1963.
interesting points: The object displayed an erratic flight path at speeds approaching 800-900 mph., The U.S. Air Force crew observed an unidentified object pacing their KC-135 jet for 250 miles., A housewife claimed to have seen a fiery star in the sky, and three seamen reported a flying object moving rapidly., A prominent businessman reported a saucer-shaped object estimated to be 75 feet in diameter over Fiji., The object observed was described as bright with no sound or exhaust trail, indicating a high-performance unconventional vehicle.
sighted object: Unidentified flying object(s) exhibiting various characteristics
witness description: Crew members of a U.S. Air Force KC-135 and local residents including a businessman and housewife
